title: Exactrem Nigeria receives its final operational license
description: Exactrem Nigeria has received its final operational license from the Central Bank of Nigeria (CBN), enabling us to facilitate inbound remittance transactions into Nigeria.
author: Idris Ogungbo

title: New Strategic Partnerships with Agent Banks
description: As part of our dedication to expanding international remittance services in the African market, Exactrem has established strategic partnerships with agent banks throughout Nigeria. Notably, we are collaborating with leading institutions such as Zenith Bank.
author: Idris Ogungbo
